info.ephyra.answerselection.filters
Class ResultLengthSorterFilter

java.lang.Object
  info.ephyra.answerselection.filters.Filter
      info.ephyra.answerselection.filters.ResultLengthSorterFilter

public class ResultLengthSorterFilter
extends Filter

The ResultLengthSorterFilter sorts the results by the lengths of the answer strings in ascending order.

This class extends the class Filter.
